description: Decrease in beach habitats (turtle laying areas, wetlands and mangroves)
descripcion: Disminushon di habitad riba playa (luga pa tortuga pone webu, mondinan i mangel)

beschrijving: Gebouwen en infrastructuur komen permanent onder water te staan

description: Salt water intrusion, reduced water and soil quality
descripcion: Intrushon di awa salo, calidad di awa i tera ta baha

description: Damage to crops, green structures, ground water, acquifers
beschrijving: Schade aan gewassen, groenstructuren, grondwater, watervoerende lagen
descripcion: Daño na cultivo, estrukturanan berde, awa di fondo i acuifero

description: Threath to salt pans, salinas and caves
descripcion: Amenasa pa saliñas, pan di sal i cueva

description: Loss of land; displacement of people and functions.
beschrijving: Verlies van land: verdrijving van mensen en functies
descripcion: Perdida di tera; desplazamiento di hende i funcionan

description: Increase in waterborne or vector born diseases
beschrijving: Toename van via water of vectoren overgedragen ziekten

description: Revision of construction and design standards
descripcion: Revicion di estandar di construccion i diseño

description: Higher storm surges and increased risk of Tsunamis
beschrijving: Hogere stormvloeden en verhoogd risico op tsunami's
descripcion: Subida di ola grandi (storm surge) i riesgu eleva pa tsunami
